capability.name: Prospect Campaign Management
capability.definition: Assess the coverage and impact of external/prospect campaigns and redirect campaign development and execution activity accordingly
capability.role: Oversee the use and assess the coverage and impact of external/prospect campaigns. Direct prospect campaign execution resources to maximize business impact and in response to any identified market opportunities and threats. Oversee campaign design and development activity.
capability.example: Prospect Campaign Management identifies competitor activity that is targeting an untapped market segment. Campaign design is initiated to develop a competitive acquisition campaign to address the threat

key_features.name: Track market/competitor activity
key_features.description: Enables track market/competitor activity to support assess the coverage and impact of external/prospect campaigns and redirect campaign development and execution activity accordingly

key_features.name: Assess customer segment performance/opportunities
key_features.description: Enables assess customer segment performance/opportunities to support assess the coverage and impact of external/prospect campaigns and redirect campaign development and execution activity accordingly

key_features.name: Assess coverage of prospect campaigns
key_features.description: Enables assess coverage of prospect campaigns to support assess the coverage and impact of external/prospect campaigns and redirect campaign development and execution activity accordingly

key_features.name: Direct the development of prospect campaigns
key_features.description: Enables direct the development of prospect campaigns to support assess the coverage and impact of external/prospect campaigns and redirect campaign development and execution activity accordingly

key_features.name: Direct the execution of prospect campaigns
key_features.description: Enables direct the execution of prospect campaigns to support assess the coverage and impact of external/prospect campaigns and redirect campaign development and execution activity accordingly
